data.eml:eml: Callinera emiliae sp. nov. (Nemertea: Palaeonemertea) from Negros Island, the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kajihara, Hiroshi (2007): Callinera emiliae sp. nov. (Nemertea: Palaeonemertea) from Negros Island, the Philippines. Zootaxa 1454: 39-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176314
